about_the_game:
Shop Town Dooter is a chaotic party top-down shooter. In arenas that throw different surprises every round, find a way to out-perform your friends, even if it means cheating, bribing, or bringing a MECH to a gunfight! Upgrade your guns mid-fights for maximum results. - no refunds in case of friendship destruction.

IGNITE YOUR PARTIES!


Are your parties feeling too lame? Need an adrenaline boost to kick things up a notch? Look no further! Shop Town Dooter offers never-ending brawls and laughter! Shop Town dooter is designed to be immediately picked up and played by anyone, but hardcore players will enjoy mastering all the weapon mods, trick shots, and the intriguing secrets of our randomly changing arenas. Each match is a new adventure waiting to be explored!

RIDE GLORIOUS MECHS


Mechs are the perfect party crasher. Indeed, they don't come cheap, but they guarantee you a round, um... I think. (remember: no refunds in case you lost the round)

CHEAT!


Feeling daring? Toss your weapon into the Dooter pit and watch the magic happen. In the next match, you'll start with that very weapon. Risky? Absolutely. But your opponents won't know what hit 'em!

HIGHLY POSITIONAL ITEMS AND WEAPONS

  • All Items can be used A) instantly or B)as a cover upgrade.
  • All Weapons are designed to have some area control. From the simple machine gun that suppresses, the mine launcher that can trap your enemies, or the energy sniper you can charge for shooting through walls, weapons will always influence how you move.
All Items can be used A) instantly or B)as a cover upgrade.

INSANE ARENAS


Chicken round? Bazooka frenzy? Weapon Buffet? Our merciless arenas keep you guessing. Every match is a fresh adventure; you'll never know what challenge awaits.

MEET THE WARTENDER


"Hi, I am selling weapons and Mechs. Prices are cheaper during the day."

The Wartender will take care of all your gun shopping needs. You have a window to buy weapons between rounds, but they are half the price if you buy them during the fight! You can also upgrade to a GOLDEN weapon and fight with style.

  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Intel Core i5 or Any M series processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
